verses.name: Genesis 36:26
verses.text: And these are the children of Dishon; Hemdan, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.

verses.name: Genesis 36:27
verses.text: The children of Ezer are these; Bilhan, and Zaavan, and Akan.

verses.name: Genesis 36:28
verses.text: The children of Dishan are these; Uz, and Aran.

verses.name: Genesis 36:29
verses.text: These are the dukes that came of the Horites; duke Lotan, duke Shobal, duke Zibeon, duke Anah,

verses.name: Genesis 36:30
verses.text: Duke Dishon, duke Ezer, duke Dishan: these are the dukes that came of Hori, among their dukes in the land of Seir.

verses.name: Genesis 36:31
verses.text: And these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom, before there reigned any king over the children of Israel.
